sentence.Network_en: Her dreams were troubled, reflecting the tenor of her waking hours.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在梦中焦虑不安，反映了她白天生活的基调。

sentence.Network_en: It was work which consumed most of his waking hours.
sentence.Network_cn: 他醒着的时候大部分时间都在工作。

sentence.Network_en: Lithuanians are waking up to a world of increasing shortages.
sentence.Network_cn: 立陶宛人开始意识到物资日益匮乏。

entry.def: When you wake or when someone or something wakes you, you become conscious again after being asleep.

example.ex: It was cold and dark when I woke at 6.30...
example.tran: 我6点半醒来时，天又冷又黑。

example.ex: Bob woke slowly to sunshine pouring in his window...
example.tran: 直到阳光从窗外泻入，鲍勃才慢慢醒来。

entry.tran: (航行中的船等留下的)伴流，尾流，航迹
entry.def: The wake of a boat or other object moving in water is the track of waves that it makes behind it as it moves through the water.

example.ex: The ride was smooth until they got into the merchant ship's wake...
example.tran: 航行一直很顺利，直到他们碰上了商船的尾流。

example.ex: Dolphins sometimes play in the wake of the boats.
example.tran: 有时海豚在船的尾流中嬉戏。

entry.def: A wake is a gathering or social event that is held before or after someone's funeral.

example.ex: A funeral wake was in progress.

entry.def: If one thing follows in the wake of another, it happens after the other thing is over, often as a result of it.

example.ex: The governor has enjoyed a huge surge in the polls in the wake of last week's convention...
example.tran: 上周的大会过后，民意调查显示州长支持率大幅上升。

example.ex: The company is in bankruptcy proceedings in the wake of a strike that began last spring.
example.tran: 去年春天开始的罢工一结束，这家公司就进入了破产程序。

entry.tran: 醒着的时间;非睡眠时间
entry.def: Your waking hours are the times when you are awake rather than asleep.

example.ex: It was work which consumed most of his waking hours...
example.tran: 他醒着的时候大部分时间都在工作。

example.ex: Most of their waking hours are spent eating.
example.tran: 他们醒着时大部分时间都在吃东西。

entry.def: If you leave something or someone in your wake, you leave them behind you as you go.

example.ex: Adam stumbles on, leaving a trail of devastation in his wake...
example.tran: 亚当蹒跚而行，沿路留下毁坏的痕迹。

example.ex: The tanks left burning vehicles in their wake as they ploughed through makeshift barricades.
example.tran: 坦克冲过临时搭建的路障，所过之处留下了燃烧的车辆。

entry.def: If you are following in someone's wake, you are following them or their example.

example.ex: In his wake came a waiter wheeling a trolley.
example.tran: 一位推着手推车的侍者紧随着他过来。

example.ex: ...the endless stream of female artists who released albums in her wake.
example.tran: 无数效仿她发行专辑的女艺术家

sentences.sentence: "days of danger and nights of waking"

means.word_mean: 1. marked by full consciousness or alertness;

sentences.sentence: "worked every moment of my waking hours"

auth_sentence.content: On waking, he discovered a woman beside him.
auth_sentence.res_content: On waking, he discovered a woman beside him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On waking, he discovered a woman beside him.

auth_sentence.content: Lately he had taken to waking in the night.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lately he had taken to waking in the night.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lately he had taken to waking in the night.

auth_sentence.content: Waking, or not, I oft reuise thereon.
auth_sentence.res_content: Waking, or not, I oft reuise thereon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Waking, or not, I oft reuise thereon.

sentences.en: She occupied all his waking thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他只要醒着脑子想的就都是她。
